src:
OCENE – ZVEZDA: Zvezda Pavkova se ugasila, Jovančić se “okliznuo“, Milunović iznad proseka
Bilo je tu dobrih trenutaka, ali razlika u kvalitetu bila je očigledna
06 Nov 2019 by Darjan Nedeljković
MILAN BORJAN 5 – Brojke ponekad ume da budu okrutne prema čuvarima mreže. Kada je Zvezda klizila ka ubedljivom porazu, pri rezultatu 3:0, reprezentativac Kanade prema zvaničnoj statistici nije imao nijednu odbranu. Utisak je da nijedan od tih golova nije mogao da brani, ali statistika je jasna. Bio siguran kod kornera i centaršuteva kada se Zvezda držala zubima za vazduh. 
MARKO GOBELJIĆ do 46. minuta 6 – Ušao u meč rovit, ali je uz nesebičnu pomoć Matea Garsije uspeo da donekle umrtvi uticaj đavolskog igrača kakav je Korejac Son. Imao je i jednu defanzivnu bravuru kada je klizećim startom u petercu očistio loptu “ispod zemlje“ koja je bila namenja upravo Sonu. Dešavanja u prvom poluvremenu i inferiornost srpskog šampiona naterala ga je da igra bez mnogo pametovanja i rizika.
NEMANJA MILUNOVIĆ 6 – Da je Crvena zvezda zadržala nulu iskusni štoper zaslužio bi odu o svemu što je prikazao sa ubitačnim napadom Totenhema. Bez imalo razmišljanja možemo da konstatujemo da je potencijalni reprezentativac Srbije odigrao najbolji meč od kada nosi dres Crvene zvezde, ma koliko to oporo zvučalo posle teškog stradanja domaćina. Bio je jak i konstantan, sposoban da zaustavi Sona u situacijama jedan na jedan. Postigao je i nekoliko defanzivnih pogodaka, jer je čupao loptu sa linije kada su je videli svi u golu. 



MILOŠ DEGENEK  5 – Ulovio Harija Kejna u ofsajd poziciju pri nerešenom rezultatu. Nije bio direktan krivac ni za jedan gol, ali bio je slabiji deo štoperskog tandema. Saigrači su ga ostavili na vetrometini, a on je svoje telo i ekipu ostavio bez prepoznatljive energije.
MILAN RODIĆ 5 – Energičan početak i onda veliki tajac. Kada je upotrebio prvi centaršut i gađao Milana Pavkova semafor je odbrojavao 76. minut. Grč koji se kao otrovni virus širio kičmom i plućima Zvezdinog tima zahvatio je i njega. Samo što je iskusni levi bek povremeno patio od onog što se u Ligi šampiona ne sme. Ravnodušnost, melanholija, spušten pogled i predaja. Delovao je kao da je sit uspeha, što je na ovom nivou takmičenja neoprostivo.
DUŠAN JOVANČIĆ  do 63. minuta 5 – Tragičar večeri. Posle perioda rehabilitacije na klupi za rezerve čekalo se da visoki vezista dugim nogama i snagom uspostavi bar povremeno dominaciju Totenhemovog veznog reda. Da konačno pokaže deo prošlogodišnjeg repertoara. Umesto toga... Ceo stadion je u tom 33. minutu povikao “pazi“, ali se Zvezdin vezista okliznuo, dozvolio da ga Sparsi uhvate u klasičnu mišolovku. I pre toga je grešio u postavljanju i igrao sa manjkom samopouzdanja. Kompletan stručni štab Crvene zvezde moraće da se pozabavi njegovim ozdravljenjem. Pojela ga je slaba forma. Morao je Milojević da ga izvede, iako je znao da će rođenog Beograđanina sačekati i poneki zvižduk.
NJEGOŠ PETROVIĆ 5 – Pitaće ga starost zašto u mladosti na svom prvom velikom ispitu nije pravio faul nad Sisokom u situaciji kod drugog gola. Makar po cenu žutog kartona. Taj detalj neiskustva pokazuje koliko su zapravo još mlečni zubi mladom reprezentativcu Srbije. Mogao je po kratkom postupku, za 90 minuta, da postane igrač o kome se priča širom Starog kontinenta. Ispostavilo se da ipak nije mogao. Jeste presekao nekoliko lopti i lepo je to izgledalo,ali... Izgledalo je da je mladi vezista goloruk bačen u kavez sa lavovima koji su ga rastrgli. Jednog dalekog dana ova utakmica će mu pomoći. Iako će on želeti da je zaboravi.



MATEO GARSIJA do 68. minuta 5 – Nije imao toliko vazduha u plućima da izdrži premijerligaški tempo igrača Totenhema. Toliko je bio opterećen dupliranjem Sona da je jednom morao da pukne u lavirntu taktički zahteva. Skandalozno je branio prostor i Denija Rouza kada je već bilo jasno da se crveno-belima smeši poraz. Kada je okrenut licem ka golu, uz višak prostora, ofanzivno je upotrebljiv. A takve situacije su bile retke. Batrgao se, čeprkao loptu, pomagao Gobeljiću. Slabašno.
MARKO MARIN 5,5 – Jedan pokušaj konkretne asistencije i to je sve. Već su svi rivali shvatili da je on u Zvezdinom timu jedini koji može da igra na ovom ili bar približnom nivou. Odlično skautiran, nigd nije mogao da mrdne od Sisoka, Ndombela i povremeno Dajera. Inferiornost kapitena srpskog šampiona u tim duelima najbolje je personifikovala ogromnu razliku u kvalitetu dva tima. Jer Marin je tu inače najmanje problematičan. Večeras nemoćan, nekadašnji reprezentativac Nemačke je jurio terenom kako bi uradio bar nešto. Ovog puta nije uspeo.
VAN LA PARA 5 – Objektivan utisak sa zapadne tribine stadiona Crvene zvezde je da se Holanđanin nije pojavio na meču. Nigde ga nije bilo. Sakriven, sa zadatkom da pomaže Rodiću u dupliranju bokova, upao je u kadar tek kada se odlepio od linije. I mogao je da uskoči u kožu junaka i možda promeni kompletan utisak o svojoj dosadašnjoj epizodi u Ljutice Bogdana. Nije loše ni šutirao, ali je Gazaniga skrenuo loptu do stative.



MILAN PAVKOV 5 – Sudbina i igra brojki provocirala je još jedno zvezdano veče golgetera iz Begeča. Desilo se suprotno. Vatra Milana Pavkova se ugasila tačno 365 dana posle istorijskih golova Liverpulu. Bilo je ovo klasično izgubljeno veče za jednog golgetera bez imalo samopouzdanja. Zicer koji je promašio bi pre tri meseca bi vezanih očiju spakovao u mrežu. Od tog trenutka je postao senka koja luta terenom i samo taložio gomilu nelogičnih poteza. U doboj situaciji je hteo da proigra Garsiju, zatim je kumovao kontri za treći pogodak...

IZMENE

ŽANDER od 46. minuta 5 – Igrao na kontra strani u nedostatku drugih rešenja. Stekao se utisak da je Totenhem izlaskom Gobeljića,računajući na taktičku aljkavost Brazilca, mogao da napravi višak po desnom boku kada god je hteo. Pojurio u kontru u jednom trenutku, ostavio rupu i Totenhem je to kaznio (mada Žander nije jedini krivac).
KANJAS od 62. minuta 5 – Ušao kada je već utakmica izgubila na intenzitetu. Nervirao publiku vraćanjem lopte unazad.
BOAĆI od 68. minuta – Malo vremena za konkretan utisak. Utakmica se već razvodnila. 

TRENER

VLADAN MILOJEVIĆ 5 – Nešto u njegovom timu debelo ne štima i pitanje je ima li pedantni stručnjak više opcija da nekakvim magičnim štapićem iskoreni brojne devijantne pojave. Nije pokušaj transfuzije sa Jovančićem i Njegošom Petrovićem doneo nekakav pomak. Srednji red je ponovo bio nemoćan i bez fizičke snage i jednako uplašen kao na nekim ranijim mečevima. Deluje da ova Crvena zvezda ponekad previše respektuje protivnika, sa ozbiljnim brojem fudbalera koji imaju manjka samopouzdanja i prave forme. Pojedinci iz prošlosezonske i one tamo sezone iz Lige Evrope igrali su najbolji fudbal života na Marakani. Sada to nije slučaj. Neke niti su pocepane. Nije sramota uzgubiti od ovakvog Totenhema, nije ni zaslužen ovako visok poraz, ali bilo je ovo jeftino školovanje.
(FOTO: Reuters)
text:
RATES - STAR: Pavkova's star goes off, Jovancic slips, Milunovic above average
There were some good times, but the difference in quality was obvious
06 Nov 2019 by Darjan Nedeljkovic
MILAN BORJAN 5 - Figures can sometimes be cruel to network guards. With the star sliding to a convincing defeat at 3-0, the Canadian national team had no defense, according to official statistics. The impression is that none of those goals were able to defend, but the statistics are clear. He was safe with cornerbacks and midfielders when Star clung to his teeth for air.
MARKO GOBELJIC by 46th minute 6 - Entered the match, but with the selfless help of Mate Garcia, he managed to subdue the influence of a devilish player like the Korean Son. He also had a defensive bravado when he cleaned the ball under the ground with a sliding start, which was aimed at Sonu. The events in the first half and the inferiority of the Serbian champion made him play without much wit and risk.
NEMANJA MILUNOVIC 6 - If the Red Star had retained a zero experienced stopper he would have deserved an ode to everything he portrayed with Tottenham's fatal attack. Without thinking, we can say that Serbia's potential national team has played the best match ever since wearing the Red Star jersey, no matter how tough it may sound after the host's severe distress. He was strong and constant, able to stop Son in one-on-one situations. He also scored some defensive shots as he was pulling the ball off the line when everyone in the goal saw it.



MILOS DEGENEK 5 - Caught Harry Kane in the offside position with a draw. He was not a direct culprit for any goal, but he was the weaker part of the stopper tandem. The teammates left him at the windmill, and he left his body and crew without recognizable energy.
MILAN RODIC 5 - An energetic start and then a big secret. He scored the 76th minute when he used the first midfield to shoot Milan Pavkova. The spasm that spread like a poisonous virus spread through the spine and lungs of the Star Team also engulfed him. Only the experienced left-back occasionally suffered from things that should not be done in the Champions League. Indifference, melancholy, lowered gaze and surrender. He acted as if he were a success, which at this level of competition is unforgivable.
DUSAN JOVANCIC by 63 minutes 5 - Tragic of the evening. After a period of rehabilitation on the reserve bench, it was expected that the tall midfielder with long legs and strength would at least occasionally dominate Tottenham's midfield. To finally show part of last year’s repertoire. Instead ... The whole stadium shouted "watch" in the 33rd minute, but Zvezdin's midfielder slipped, letting the Spars get caught in a classic mousetrap. Even before that, he had made a mistake in setting up and playing with a lack of confidence. The Red Star's complete professional staff will have to deal with his recovery. He was eaten by poor form. Milojevic had to take him out, even though he knew that a native Belgrade man would wait for some whistle.
NJEGOŠ PETROVIĆ 5 - He will be asked by the age why he did not foul over Sisok in his second goal situation at his first major exam. At least for the price of the yellow card. This detail of inexperience shows how much milk teeth are actually to the young Serbian national team. He could in a short time, in 90 minutes, become a player talked about across the Old Continent. Turns out he couldn't though. Did cut some balls and it looked nice, but ... It looked like a young midfielder was thrown barefoot into a cage with lions tearing it apart. One distant day this match will help him. Although he will want to forget her.



MATEO GARSIA by 68 minutes 5 - He didn't have that much air in his lungs to withstand the Tottenham Premier League pace. He was so overwhelmed by the duplication of Son that he once had to burst into a labyrinth of tactical demands. He was scandalously defending the space and Denny Rose when it was already clear that the red and white were smiling defeat. When facing away from the goal, with excess space, it is offensively usable. And such situations were rare. He jerked, scooped up the ball, assisted Gobeljic. Poor.
MARKO MARIN 5.5 - One attempt at concrete assistance and that's all. Already, all rivals have realized that he is the only one on the Star team who can play at this or at least approximate level. Well scouted, he couldn't move anywhere from Sisok, Ndombel, and occasionally Dayer. The captaincy of the Serbian champion in these duels best personified the huge difference in the quality of the two teams. Because Marin is otherwise the least problematic. Tonight powerless, the former German national team rode the field to do at least something. He failed this time.
VAN LA PARA 5 - An objective impression from the west stand of Red Star Stadium is that the Dutchman did not show up for the match. He was nowhere to be found. Hidden, with the task of assisting Rodic in doubling his hips, he only burst into the frame when he peeled off the line. And he could step into the hero's skin and perhaps change the overall impression of his episode so far in Bogdan's Angers. Not a bad shot, but Gazaniga turned the ball over to the post.



MILAN PAVKOV 5 - The fate and numbers game provoked another stellar evening of goalies from Begec. The opposite happened. Milan Pavkov's fire was extinguished exactly 365 days after Liverpool's historic goals. It was a classic lost night for a goalie with no confidence. A miss who missed it would pack his blindfold three months ago. From that moment on, he became a shadow wandering the terrain and only deposited a bunch of illogical moves. In a good situation, he wanted to play Garcia, then he countered for a third hit ...

CHANGES

GENDER of 46 minutes 5 - Played on the counter side in the absence of other solutions. The impression was that Tottenham, with the departure of Gobeljic, counting on the tactical agility of the Brazilian, could make a surplus on the right flank whenever he wanted. He rushed into the counter at one point, left a hole, and Tottenham punished it (though Zander was not the only culprit).
KANJAS from 62 minutes 5 - Entered when the match had already lost in intensity. Annoyed the audience by rolling the ball back.
BOOTS of 68 minutes - Little time for a concrete impression. The match has already been diluted.

COACH

VLADAN MILOJEVIC 5 - There is something wrong with his team and the question is whether a pedantic expert has more options to eradicate numerous deviant phenomena with a magic wand. No attempt at transfusion with Jovancic and Njegos Petrovic has made any progress. The middle order was again powerless and without physical strength and just as scared as in some of the earlier matches. It seems that this Red Star sometimes respects his opponent too much, with a serious number of footballers who lack confidence and form. Individuals from last season and those there from the Europa League played the best football of life in Marakana. Now that's not the case. Some threads are torn. It's not a shame to lose from a Tottenham like this, it wasn't even deserved for such a high defeat, but it was a cheap schooling.
(PHOTO: Reuters)
